Dialogue.Page: If you have come to take a look at my beautiful face, then I regret to inform you that I have left this area already.
You may be asking how I exactly did that. Well, if you can repair things by looking at them and holding E, then so can I.
You also may be asking why I did that as well.
I've decided to dabble in the culinary arts. I opened a resturaunt!
So why have you never heard of this six-star paragon of an establishment? That's because it's floatin' out past Dark Bramble and in the deep, dark reaches of space.
How do I know I'm still in a stable heliocentric orbit? I don't!
Why do you still hear my harmonica? I looped a recording of it to mess with everyone on TH.
Where did I get the materials to build a resturaunt from the nonexistent ground up? Why, I stole it while nobody was looking!
Who are my customers? My lovely tank of anglerfish, of course! There's Kyanite, Sunstone, Fluorite, and Agate! Nobody else. Maybe I'll even run into an alien or something.
What do I even serve? Raw bramble. You get used to it after you try it enough times. Or maybe there's just too many splinters in my tongue to taste anymore.

So whoever you are, come on down (or radially??) to Feldspar's today for a nice, hearty plate of wood! Go back up into space and follow the sound of the harmonica. It should be somewhere near the ecliptic, I hope.
The signal will sound like the one you know but very sped up and high pitched. This is to scare the others away from it!
PS: I'm very proud of you for not getting chomped by one of those big fish. Keep it up!
PS PS: You cannot tell anyone I'm there. If you do, I'll come back and punt you into the sun.
Love (or hate, I don't know who you are), Feldspar
